title: GET_VEHICLE_HOMING_LOCKON_STATE
content:
0xFBDE9FD8// GetVehicleHomingLockonState
int GET_VEHICLE_HOMING_LOCKON_STATE(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check.Returns: The lock on state.Gets the lock on state for the specified vehicle. See the client-side GET_VEHICLE_HOMING_LOCKON_STATE native for a description of lock on states.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_HOMING_LOCKON_STATE
GetVehicleHomingLockonState(vehicle)
